messages.subject: weaning
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/7/02 11:04:32 AM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:  S ok Elissa. It was someone that
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/7/02 11:04:32 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< NOT ME!!
Elissa >>

S'ok Elissa. It was someone that didn't believe in the biblical creation but
was trying from that viewpoint to advocate not weaning your child until they
were ready.
That's why I thought it might be you.

Ren

messages.subject: weaning
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/5/02 7:42:35 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/5/02 7:42:35 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< and since I haven't seen anyone actually
> offer the ideas requested, >>

Since I don't agree with the premise of pushing weaning, I can't offer ideas.
It's like someone asking me what Math curriculum they should use and asking
me to outline a plan for them. No can do.

Ren
